title: Silk Road Conflict
summary: Clashes between traders and nomadic tribes disrupted silk trade in Central Asia.

title: Spice Route Expansion
summary: European traders, led by the Dutch, expanded spice routes in the Indian Ocean.

title: Ottoman-Safavid Trade War
summary: Ottoman-Safavid conflicts disrupted trade routes through Persia.

title: Venetian Trade Monopoly
summary: Venice secured a monopoly on Mediterranean trade routes.

title: Mongol Trade Route Protection
summary: Mongol Empire ensured safe passage for traders along the Silk Road.

title: Portuguese Spice Route Control
summary: Portuguese forces captured key ports to control spice trade in India.

title: Trans-Saharan Trade Conflict
summary: Tribal conflicts disrupted gold and salt trade across the Sahara.

title: Hanseatic League Trade
summary: Hanseatic League dominated Baltic Sea trade routes.

title: Maritime Silk Road Piracy
summary: Piracy increased along the Maritime Silk Road, impacting trade.

title: Amber Road Trade
summary: Amber trade routes flourished between the Baltic and Mediterranean.
